 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲבַעְבֻּעֹת‎</span> **noun feminine plural** ==blisters, boils== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲבַעְבּוּעְיָן‎</span>; compare [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֶּעְבַּע‎</span>, Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּעְבּוּעַ בּוּעָה‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) [[Exod.9.9|Exod 9:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁחִין פֹּרֵחַ אֲבַעְבֻּעֹת‎</span>, compare v[[Exod.9.10|Exod 9:10]].
